currLessonSubject: The Father of Two Lost Sons
christConnection: The Pharisees and scribes criticized Jesus for His practice of welcoming and dining with sinners. The stories He told in response to thier criticism focused on God's joy over sinners coming to repentance. The God who seeks and saves the lost is Jesus, the Savior whose search-and-rescue mission is accomplised at great personal cost to Himself.
currLessonSummary: God calls us to celebrate at his goodness in welcoming any repentant sinner home. Join us as we dive into this teaching of Jesus concerning the prodigal son, where we discuss the grace-filed posture of God in embracing any sinner who repents.
